description: The machine hit a traffic light before colliding with the Post Office on Platt Street in Wigan
title: Digger 'hits traffic light' and crashes into Post Office in Wigan
title_page: Digger 'hits traffic light' and crashes into Post Office in Wigan - BBC News
maintext:
A post office worker has said she was "shocked" when she arrived at work this morning to find a digger had crashed into the building.
Ebonny said, the digger hit and knocked down a traffic light before hitting the business on Platt Street in Wigan.
"I was shocked initially, it's not what you expect to see first thing in the morning," she said.
A man has been arrested on suspicion of assault and dangerous driving, Greater Manchester Police confirmed.
